CustomField.description: Only to be used in quick texts
CustomField.formula: IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY())), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()+1)), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()+2)), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()+3)), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()+4)), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( Birthdate = DATE(YEAR(Birthdate), MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY()+5)), "et joyeux anniversaire,", IF( AND( TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,23), TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,27) ), "et un joyeux Noël,", IF( AND( TODAY() >= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),12,29), TODAY() <= DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,1,2) ), "et une bonne année,", IF( WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 6, "et un très bon week-end,","et")))))))))
CustomField.label: Quick Text Message
